config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _journalSizeThreshold configuration is used in the journal() method to set the size threshold for the PersistentJournal. It is passed as a parameter when creating a new PersistentJournal instance.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the journal() method is called, which depends on the logic flow of the application. The frequency of triggering can vary based on how often the journal() method is invoked.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The _journalSizeThreshold configuration option impacts the size threshold for the journal storage. Setting a higher threshold may allow for more data to be stored in the journal before it needs to be archived or cleared, while setting a lower threshold may result in more frequent archiving or clearing of journal data.
